article: My name is David. There are many things in my room. There is a sweater  _  the bed. It's  _  . I also have a pair of  _  . They are blue, too. There is a desk and a chair in  _  room. A football is under the  _  . I like it very much. I  _  play football very well. I often play it with my friends. A picture is on the wall. You can see four people in it. The man and the woman are my  _  . They work in a school and teach Chinese. They are  _  . The little girl is my  _  . She is very lovely . She is only three years old. She doesn't go to school, so she  _  read or write. I have a happy family.
